comments: Great person, he tells funny stories. Love his Jamaican accent. Highly reccomend

Very Helpful....He breaks everything down so that its easy to learn. Also Gives study guides for test and always lets you know when a quiz is coming up...Do your homework and know how to work your calculator and you will do fine.
Nice guy! attendance nopt required! Allowed to do test corrections for 30% back!

I am a freshman, and I am currently taking him! I have an average of a 99% in the class. Yes you take notes almost everyday, and yes you have quizzes and test but he gives you hints to quizzes and a study guide for test! Easy A :)
Avoid like the plague. Trust me for your sake. Enough said.
